snippet: President Nicolás Maduro and the leaders of a coalition of opposition political parties agreed on Tuesday to take part in talks that could help defuse tensions that have arisen during two months of anti-government protests.
abstract: Venezuelan Pres Nicolas Maduro and opposition leaders agree to take part in talks that could help defuse tensions that have arisen during two months of anti-government protests.
lead_paragraph: President Nicolás Maduro and the leaders of a coalition of opposition political parties agreed on Tuesday to take part in talks that could help defuse tensions that have arisen during two months of anti-government protests.

headline.main: Venezuela: President and Leaders of the Opposition Agree to Hold Talks
headline.print_headline: Venezuela: President and Leaders of the Opposition Agree to Hold Talks
